properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_NUM = ?
SELECT * FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT * FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_EMAIL LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT * FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_BIRTHDATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT * FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
